Instruction: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) and grease a baking sheet.

Combine the egg, granulated sugar, butter, flour, cornstarch, powdered milk, baking powder, and salt in a bowl. Knead for a few minutes until a soft dough forms. Divide the dough into 12 pieces, rolling each piece into a ball and then slightly flattening it. Arrange them on the prepared baking sheet, leaving 1 inch of space between each.
Bake in the preheated oven until they turn light brown, approximately 10 minutes. Allow to cool completely and store in an airtight container.
